## ConcurrentTilerFacade.getTiler() method

Returns a \[\[WorkerBasedTiler\]\] instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getTiler(tilerServiceType: string, scriptUrl?: string, workerCount?: number): ITiler;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tilerServiceType | string | The name of the tiler service type. |
|  scriptUrl | string | The optional URL with the workers' script. |
|  workerCount | number | The number of web workers to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ITiler](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.md)
